ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Best soloing class
ygData.msgSnippet: That reminds me, i got a pet for my cleric.. Well, more like a familiar that I couldn t command. I found the greedy beggar laying on the ground. tried to loot
ygData.messageBody:
That reminds me, i got a pet for my cleric.. Well, more like a familiar that
I couldn't command. I found the greedy beggar laying on the ground. tried to
loot him bc I thought he was dead. It kept conning him. I finally hailed him
and he suddenly popped up and began following me around. other people gave
him stuff and talked to him but he stuck with me. when things attacked me he
came to my defense. when I fought things he fought too. It was pretty funny.
luv,
-Su

Not sure if i would call the Mage the greatest pet class any longer.
-----Ursprungligt meddelande-----
Från: Ganlet [mailto:skylr81@...]
Skickat: den 17 januari 2002 23:58
Till: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Ämne: RE: [EverQuest] Best soloing class


You don’t know about the mage? Well……
Mage AKA the Magician is the greatest pet class in the game; our pets are
second to none. We are also great summoners, able to summon food, water,
equipment and lots of other useful stuff; we are also the 3rd best nukers,
under wizards and druids. The big downfall is that we are totally dependent
on our pet, if they die there is a good chance that we will die too, unless
we can get a gate off, but usually that doesn’t happen, our pets are very
powerful. That’s about it, overall a very good class, good for soloing and
in groups. I’m very happy being a mage Any other question regarding the
Mage feel free to send em my way

Ganlet Stormcaller
50th Gnome Mage of Brell
Member of the Consul D’Tredecim

-----Original Message-----
From: Rob LeBeau [mailto:rlebeau65@...]
Sent: Thursday, January 17, 2002 2:02 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Best soloing class

Holy smoke.
The Mage? hmm I have not heard many speak of this
class.

A brief reason behind it would help?

Thanks

> I'd say the best would be a necro, but I've had a
> lot of success with my
> mage, so far I've been able to solo 1-50
